resources.string:
FOSSmaster allows users to access their Github profiles and manage the same. It enhances your experience using the interactive components in the app.

 About the main features : 

 \> It contains a 'Current Feed' section which shows the current activities done by the people you follow. It is similar to the 'Dashboard' you get on Github website.

 \> 'My Repositories' section shows all your public repos and forked ones.

 \> 'Starred Repositeries' section lists all the repos you have starred. 

 \> 'Pull Requests' section helps you manage all your current active or closed pull requests. 

 \> The main attraction of this app is the 'Open Source Contribution' section. Using this feature user can find repos for contribution with filters like programming language and difficulty level.
